attributes.action: Petition to have Stan Lee awarded a posthumous honorary knighthood.
attributes.background: Petition to have Stan Lee awarded a posthumous honorary knighthood not only for his contribution to arts and culture, but also his contribution to society and humanity.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
